messages.message: some feedback somewhat related to the above thread — this sharing modal is somewhat confusing to me. Specifically, I’m confused on whether clicking “copy link” and sharing that would allow someone access even if the radio selection is “just me”.  My suggestion would be only showing the “copy link” button if the sharing perms are set to “anyone in the org”  cc @avi  (also @andy bc we use the same design for app sharing)

The sharing for any of the apps is somewhat confusing, along with these dialogs of enabling/copying/etc. I’ll include this topic with our updated design of the App Views which incorporates the chatbots too.
